properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 8:49AM CST until January 17 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...L'anguille
River...Obion River...S.F. of the Forked Deer River...Saint Francis
River...Tombigbee River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River near Amory
* until Friday January 17.
* At 08 AM Tuesday the stage was 21.1 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring AND Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 24.9 feet on Wednesday January 15.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Saturday January 11 and will
continue rising to near 24.9 feet by Wednesday January 15. The
river will fall below flood stage Friday January 17.
* At 23.0 feet...Most lowland and farm land near the river is
flooded. Equipment and livestock may need to be moved to higher
ground.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
